ygData.subject: Arbitrary methods on HTML FORM
ygData.msgSnippet: One thing just struck me, or I was being idiot the whole time. FORM has a METHOD attribute, so it means we can use it on anything? I mean, DELETE, PUT,

Subject: Arbitrary methods on HTML FORM

One thing just struck me, or I was being idiot the whole time.

FORM has a METHOD attribute, so it means we can use it on anything? I
mean, DELETE, PUT, OPTIONS, HEAD, or whatever?

If it is, great...

The annoying thing is that there's no way to post a form without using a
button or image? Or JavaScript, I mean something like <a
href="javascript:document.forms[0].submit();"> isn't any good.

Talking about the future isn't really of my interest... I want things
working yesterday.

Hendy Irawan, GaulDong - http://dev.gauldong.net
